Research LTC insurance options for Grace
Model 529 catch-up contributions in GPS

past_conversations.summary: Quarterly GPS review. Retirement goal on track. Discussed Total Tax 365 benefits — enrolled Select UMA. Robert mentioned possible early retirement. Reviewed risk tolerance — confirmed moderate-aggressive still appropriate.
action_items: Enroll Select UMA in Total Tax 365
Run Aladdin early retirement scenario
Update GPS with early retirement option

past_conversations.summary: Annual comprehensive review. Consolidated two old SMAs into Select UMA. Discussed Europe vacation savings. Margaret interested in ESG investing for Roth IRA. Set up auto-contributions to 529s.
action_items: Complete UMA consolidation paperwork
Send ESG fund options for Margaret's Roth
Set up monthly 529 contributions

compliance_notes: Form CRS delivered 2017-03. Last suitability review 2025-08. No outstanding compliance items.
